SELECT SUM(od.dosage_weight) AS weight,od.dosage_name AS dosageName FROM orchard_address oa LEFT JOIN orchard_garden og ON oa.address_id=og.garden_address_id LEFT JOIN orchard_ground_block ogb ON og.garden_id=ogb.gb_garden_id LEFT JOIN orchard_plant op ON ogb.gb_id=op.plant_gb_id LEFT JOIN orchard_crop oc ON op.plant_crop_id=oc.crop_id LEFT JOIN orchard_farm_work ofw ON og.garden_id=ofw.farm_gd_id LEFT JOIN orchard_dosage od ON ofw.farm_id=od.farm_id
WHERE
oc.crop_name=#{variety} and

SELECT oc.crop_name AS cropName, SUM(dosage_weight) AS weight, date_format(od.create_time,'%m') AS time FROM orchard_farm_work ofw LEFT JOIN orchard_plant op ON ofw.farm_plant_id=op.plant_id LEFT JOIN orchard_crop oc ON op.plant_crop_id=oc.crop_id LEFT JOIN orchard_garden og ON ofw.farm_gd_id=og.garden_id LEFT JOIN orchard_dosage od ON ofw.farm_id=od.farm_id LEFT JOIN orchard_address oa ON og.garden_address_id=oa.address_id WHERE ofw.farm_type=1 and oc.crop_name IN ( SELECT oc.crop_name FROM orchard_warehouse ow LEFT JOIN orchard_crop oc ON ow.wh_crop_id=oc.crop_id LEFT JOIN orchard_dictionary od ON ow.wh_package_std=od.dic_id LEFT JOIN orchard_address oa ON ow.wh_addr_id=oa.address_id WHERE ow.wh_type=1 AND wh_delete_flag=1 GROUP BY oc.crop_name ORDER BY SUM(od.dic_code) DESC ) GROUP BY time,cropName LIMIT 0,3
